snippet.title: I Became Gay from Translating My New Roommate's Short Story (GFT) Trailer
snippet.description:
I Became Gay from Translating My New Roommate’s Short Story (or GFT) is a yuri visual novel about two "working" adults in the city of Chicago. It is the first major project by the Prof. Lily visual novel collective.

Demo now available.

GFT is expected to release in 2022, retailing at a price of $6.99 USD.

https://proflilyvn.itch.io/gft
https://proflilyvn.itch.io

https://twitter.com/proflilyvn
